description: The most welcoming section of the extensive Cantina Toblino complex is home to the large, contemporary and minimalist-style Hosteria. Here, a young chef serves simple reinterpretations of regional dishes with a focus on zero-mile produce with the occasional yet astute use of ingredients from further afield.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus, Terrace, Wheelchair access
